column5: Navionics just added a cool feature to their Platinum+ and HotMaps Platinum chips, SonarCharts Shading, high definition relief shading on the Satellite Overlay layer. This feature allows you to discern depth changes easily!Â https://www.navionics.com/usa/blog/post/sonarchart-shading-being-added-to-platinum-and-hotmaps-platinum/?fbclid=IwAR05slZtt-0k0nAaStSbvVcpkupu50U5U1nldAoF9pfd7IeueH87-FTOdZU
The Navionics Platinum+ & Hotmaps Platinum are also on sale for the month of May! So if you were in need of a new chip...
Finally got my helix 9 all set up with navionics and the autochart zero lines card...overlaying autochart data over navionics, ridiculously sick. Now I just need to spend more time charting!
We could all use more time on the water whether it is charting or just fishing! LOL Here are some different views with the SonarChart Shading!
